      • validateInput

        public int validateInput(int min,
                         int max)
        Name:validateInput
        This method allows to validate the user inputs in numbers Pre:The scanner variable is created, define the number that will be requested and the error message must exist
        Post:The requested number has been validated as numerical data
        Parameters:
        min - Integer. Variable containing the minimum range in which the integer to be validated can take value. min != null
        max - Integer. Variable containing the maximum range in which the integer to be validated can take value. max != null
        Returns:
        an integer that has been validated

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(int min,
                       int max,
                       int n)
        Name:inRange
        This method checks whether an integer is in range from two integers (min and max). Pre:The numbers must be previously validated
        Post:Checking was operated correctly
        Parameters:
        min - Integer. Variable containing the minimum range in which the integer to be validated can take value. min != null
        max - Integer. Variable containing the maximum range in which the integer to be validated can take value. max != null
        n - int. Variable containing the integer you want to check if it is in range. n != null
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether it meets the condition
